upgrade.h1: Download the latest Chrome browser to play Club Penguin!
upgrade.p: Ask your parents for help before you download.
upgrade.a:after: to find out more about this update.

install.h1: Oops! You need the latest Chrome browser to play Club Penguin.
install.p: Ask your parent to download it from google.com/chrome.
install.a:after: to find out more about this update.

cjs.1: Sorry! There was a problem loading Card-Jitsu Snow.
cjs.2: Please try again, or contact support if the problem continues.

cjsupgrade.1: Oops! You need the latest Chrome browser to play Card-Jitsu Snow.
cjsupgrade.2: Ask your parent to download it from google.com/chrome.
